parameters.query:
=-- Batch upsert registrants into Supabase
{% for registrant in $json.registrants %}
SELECT upsert_webinar_registrant(
  {{ registrant.webinarjam_id }},
  {% if registrant.lead_id %}{{ registrant.lead_id }}{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.webinar_id }},
  {{ registrant.schedule_id }},
  {% if registrant.event_id %}{{ registrant.event_id }}{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  '{{ registrant.email | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.first_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.last_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  {% if registrant.phone_country_code %}'{{ registrant.phone_country_code }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.phone_number %}'{{ registrant.phone_number }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  '{{ registrant.webinar_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.schedule | replace("'", "''") }}',
  {% if registrant.event_date %}'{{ registrant.event_date }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.signup_date %}'{{ registrant.signup_date }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.attended_live }},
  {% if registrant.date_live %}'{{ registrant.date_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.entered_live %}'{{ registrant.entered_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.time_live %}'{{ registrant.time_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.purchased_live }},
  {{ registrant.revenue_live }},
  {{ registrant.attended_replay }},
  {% if registrant.date_replay %}'{{ registrant.date_replay }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.time_replay %}'{{ registrant.time_replay }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.purchased_replay }},
  {{ registrant.revenue_replay }},
  {{ registrant.subscribed }},
  {% if registrant.gdpr_status %}'{{ registrant.gdpr_status | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.gdpr_communications %}'{{ registrant.gdpr_communications | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_source %}'{{ registrant.utm_source | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_medium %}'{{ registrant.utm_medium | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_campaign %}'{{ registrant.utm_campaign | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_term %}'{{ registrant.utm_term | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_content %}'{{ registrant.utm_content | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %}
) as upserted_id;
{% endfor %}

=-- Batch upsert additional page registrants
{% for registrant in $json.registrants %}
SELECT upsert_webinar_registrant(
  {{ registrant.webinarjam_id }},
  {% if registrant.lead_id %}{{ registrant.lead_id }}{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.webinar_id }},
  {{ registrant.schedule_id }},
  {% if registrant.event_id %}{{ registrant.event_id }}{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  '{{ registrant.email | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.first_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.last_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  {% if registrant.phone_country_code %}'{{ registrant.phone_country_code }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.phone_number %}'{{ registrant.phone_number }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  '{{ registrant.webinar_name | replace("'", "''") }}',
  '{{ registrant.schedule | replace("'", "''") }}',
  {% if registrant.event_date %}'{{ registrant.event_date }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.signup_date %}'{{ registrant.signup_date }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.attended_live }},
  {% if registrant.date_live %}'{{ registrant.date_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.entered_live %}'{{ registrant.entered_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.time_live %}'{{ registrant.time_live }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.purchased_live }},
  {{ registrant.revenue_live }},
  {{ registrant.attended_replay }},
  {% if registrant.date_replay %}'{{ registrant.date_replay }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.time_replay %}'{{ registrant.time_replay }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {{ registrant.purchased_replay }},
  {{ registrant.revenue_replay }},
  {{ registrant.subscribed }},
  {% if registrant.gdpr_status %}'{{ registrant.gdpr_status | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.gdpr_communications %}'{{ registrant.gdpr_communications | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_source %}'{{ registrant.utm_source | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_medium %}'{{ registrant.utm_medium | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_campaign %}'{{ registrant.utm_campaign | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_term %}'{{ registrant.utm_term | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %},
  {% if registrant.utm_content %}'{{ registrant.utm_content | replace("'", "''") }}'{% else %}NULL{% endif %}
) as upserted_id_page_{{ $json.page }};
{% endfor %}

-- Final sync summary
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_synced,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN attended_live THEN 1 END) as attended_count,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN NOT attended_live THEN 1 END) as no_show_count,
  MAX(last_synced_at) as last_sync_time,
  webinar_name
FROM webinar_registrants 
WHERE webinar_id = 13
GROUP BY webinar_name;
